text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here
Yes its me bob
Join me for learning street with bob
“Hello Kids! I am Bob the Train, your DJ & Host.
“ Host. Welcome to our Phonics show..
“Our participants in this show are the letters of the alphabet. Isn’t that cool?
They will sing, dance and teach us sounds that start with the letters.
Now, let’s say a big hello and welcome to our wonderful judges”
Are you ready, judges?
Yes Bob!
Let’s give a RRRRRRRoaring welcome to Mr. R!

Please say with all your might
Mr. R is R R right.
R R right R R right.
A R R R R rabbit has a funny habit

He hops and jumps all day long
A R R Rabbit goes ping pong.
A R R R R rooster, Crows early morning as a wake-up booster
A hen is a female A rooster is male. A R R rooster has a lovely tail
There goes a R R  rat hiding from the cat.

Eating cheese makes him fat
This rotund and round little R R rat.

See that lovely R R rainbow
It has seven colors did you know?
Violet, Indigo, blue, green, red, orange, yellow are the seven colors of a R rainbow.
A pretty little rose I can smell with my nose.

With sharp thorns that can prick and sting
A R R rose blooms in the spring.

A roses often are R red
Growing in the garden bed.

Like apples red and red strawberries
R R red is the color of cherries.

In a R R  rocket you can soar,
See the universe and much more

High up in the air it goes and goes
A R R rocket with a tail and nose.
A robot is a machine like this one on your screen
It can do almost anything, this R R robot can also sing.
This R R robot can also sing.
That was arousing song, but its time to say so long.

Judges what have you to say today?
Hasn’t Mr. R just made our day?
Remarkable!
Reliable!
Responsible!
Rocking!
Thank you Mr. R, and respected Judges.
We will be back soon with the sweet sound of other letters of the alphabet.
Till then Adios !
Hey kids!
Watch the video again and count the number of words
That start with the letter of the alphabet in this episode
Don't forget to put your answers in the comment section below
Thank You!
